Uses of Class
mayflower.Keyboard

    • Uses of Keyboard in mayflower

      Methods in mayflower that return Keyboard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Keyboard Stage.getKeyboard()
      Return the Keyboard object
      Keyboard Mayflower.getKeyboard()
      Returns a Keyboard object with the current status of the keyboard since the last call to the update method
      Keyboard Actor.getKeyboard()
      Return the Keyboard object This method must be called again every time the update() method is called to get the most recent state of the keyboard.
